channel.title: Manual Install?
channel.description: I want to install the mod (it looks fantastic) and so I downloaded the 7z archive and the installer. However, when I run the installer it starts extracting the archive and all to my default drive (D:\) but I barely have any space on D: because it's a very small partition I only use to run Windows. So there is no room for a huge archive to be extracted to D:, even temporarily. So I went into the 7z archive in WinRAR and I wonder how I might go about installing it that way? I see no EXEs or anything so is it really all in the archive? I just need some kind of way to install it on my storage drive myself.

item.title: Manual Install?
item.dc:creator: instinx
item.description:
Go here: C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\sourcemods
create a folder called BMS then put all of the files inside the BMS folder from the .7z then restart steam, Black Mesa should appear in your library.
